name: Economic and Legal Sabotage of PSN Power
description: Disrupting the financial and legal footholds that PSNs use to maintain control over victims and systems.

cards.title: Cutting Narcissistic Economic Leverage
cards.description: Severing financial dependencies and securing personal sovereignty.
bulletpoints: Identifying financial control tactics used by PSNs.
Creating independent revenue streams to remove leverage.

cards.title: Weaponizing Legal Protections
cards.description: Using legal systems to shield yourself and dismantle PSN control.
bulletpoints: Deploying restraining orders and legal distancing mechanisms.
Utilizing defamation laws to neutralize smear campaigns.
Leveraging whistleblower protection to expose high-level PSNs.

cards.title: Destroying Their Social Credibility
cards.description: Dismantling PSN reputations through strategic social exposure.
bulletpoints: Feeding controlled leaks to targeted social circles.
Amplifying inconsistencies in their projected persona.
